name: Shelter-plugin
tagline: A Minecraft Bukkit plugin that's in heavy development.
body:
### The Ultimate Shelter: A Plugin
This plugin is in development by DentistWhat, and is his first Bukkit plugin. Naturally it's incredibly flawed, but he's trying, and that's what counts.

### The Basic Idea
The [Ultimate Shelter Challenge](http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1748635-challengeultimate-shelter-challenge-not-a-map/) is a brilliant idea, and the Dentist loved it so much he decided to go ahead and attempt to create a plugin listing the rules of the Challenge, as well as keep track of current status of the challenge.

### Will this plugin ever be complete?
Probably not, no. The Dentist is far too lazy.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
